title: I cant find the change HUD option???
body:
The new HUD is so frustrating, and in a game where split second timing is key, changing everything around so no one can find anything it isn't the best idea, 
also everything is the same tone of blue and just transparent enough that it feels like a blue haze is on top of everything, it is kinda hard on the eyes, and i am a graphic designer and the cramming everything together isn't smart, the eye just gets lost and it takes longer to differentiate the info you want from the other info, than it takes to move your eye up to the corner of the screen like before. 
So i don't like it, not going to criticise anyone who does, but i personally don't want to use it but i cant find the button or option to switch back to the old one. so can someone tell me where to find it?

replies.body: its auto change (well was for me)

There is no option to change back yet.

There might never be one.
